name: Probe Explorer
description:
Guide your probe through space to explore different environments! 

(This is not a finished game. There are only 3 levels at this point with very simple mechanics - avoid obstacles and land on the platform at the end to proceed.)

Please feel free to share your feedback, ideas and helpful suggestions for improvement!

Controls:

- W or Up Arrow to Thrust Forward.

- A or Left Arrow to Rotate Left.

- D or Right Arrow to Rotate Right.
